column2: "Na iyi ekyir no a ɔkyɛɛr kakra no
column4: Samson dze apɔnkyeba kɔree kɔhwɛɛ ne yer; na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Mobɔkɔ me yer nkyɛn wɔ pia mu. Na ɔbaa no n'egya amma no kwan ma ɔannkɔ."

column3: Emi dze modween dɛ ɔtan na etan no; dɛm ntsi medze no ama wo nyɛnko bi: ana no nua kuma no no ho nnyɛ fɛw nnsen ɔno? Ibotum afa no ahyɛ ananmu."
Afei dze wɔ Filistiafo afamu no
column4: sɛ meyɛ hɔn bɔn bi a

column2: "Na Samson sii mu kɔree kɛkyeer nsɔ ahaasa
column4: na ɔdaan dua faam dua ho
column5: na ɔdze gyabaa hyɛɛ mu wɔ ndua ebien biara ntamu."

column2: "Na aber a ɔsosɔɔ ngyaabaa no ano gya no
column3: ogyaa hɔn ma wɔkɔr Filistiafo eburow kwa mu
column4: na wɔhyeew eburow ekuwekuw na eburow a osisi hɔ no nyina

column3: Woana yɛɛ iyi? Na wɔsee dɛ
column6: na ɔdze no ama ne nyɛnko bi. Na Filistiafo fowee bae
column7: na wɔdze gya bɛhyeew ɔbaa no na n'egya."

column3: Sɛ hom ayɛ iyi mpo a
column4: gyedɛ medzi hom wer ansaana n'ekyir no megyaa."

column2: "Na ɔbobɔɔ hɔn ndwonku na aserɛ do kunkum hɔn dwɛɛ: na osianee kɔree kɛtsenaa Etam ɔbotan tokur mu."

column4: na wɔtserɛɛw hɔn mu wɔ Lehi."

column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom aba hɛn do yi? Na wɔsee dɛ
column5: yaayɛ no dɛ mbrɛ ɔdze ayɛ hɛn no."

column2: "Nna Juda mbarimba mpemebiasa sii mu kɔr Etam ɔbotan tokur no mu
column4: Ana ɔwo nnyim dɛ Filistiafo na wodzi hɛn do hen? Ebɛnadze na edze ayɛ hɛn yi? Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column6: dɛmara so na medze ayɛ hɔn."

column4: ma yɛdze wo aakɛhyɛ Filistiafo nsa. Na Samson see hɔn dɛ
column5: Hom nka ntam nkyerɛ me dɛ homara runntu nnhyɛ mo do."

column3: Dabida na kyekyer ara na yɛbɛkyekyer wo
column4: na yɛdze wo akɛhyɛ hɔn nsa: na oku dze yerunnku wo. Na wɔdze ntampehoma fofor ebien kyekyeer no
column5: na wɔdze no fi ɔbotan no mu bae."

column4: na wohuroo no: na EWURADZE no sunsum baa no do dzendzenndzen
column5: na ntampehoma a ɔwɔ n'abasa ho yɛɛ dɛ asaaba a wɔdze gya aka
column6: na ne nkyehoma no fii ne nsa ho gui."

column3: Medze asoaso n'adadaw mehyɛɛ hɔn ekuwekuw
column4: Medze asoaso n'adadaw mekum mbarimba apem."
ɔtoow adadaw no fii ne nsamu kyenee; na bea no wɔfrɛɛ no Ramat-lehi."

column5: Ɔwo nam w'akowaa nsa do edze nkwagye kɛse ama: na afei nsukɔm nku me

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn paa otokur korkorba a ɔwɔ Lehi no mu
column3: na nsu fi mu bae; na ɔnomee no
column5: na onyaa nkwa: dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ bea no ne dzin En-hakkore a ɔwɔ Lehi dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na odzii Israel enyim wɔ Filistiafo nda no mu mfe eduonu."
